mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_service_tb (user_id, title, request, request_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM customer_service_tb cs LEFT JOIN user_tb u ON cs.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id IS NULL OR u.id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY cs.id DESC limit #{limit} offset ${offset};

SELECT cs.id, u.id AS user_id, cs.title, u.user_name, cs.request, cs.request_time, cs.response, cs.response_time FROM customer_service_tb cs LEFT JOIN user_tb u ON cs.user_id = u.id WHERE cs.id = #{id} ORDER BY cs.id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE customer_service_tb SET response = #{response}, response_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
